## Checklist

- [ ] Commit messages and pull request title are clear and informative.
- [ ] Documentation has been updated if needed
- [ ] Tests pass `cargo test`
- [ ] Code is formatted using `rustfmt`.
- [ ] Code is linted using `clippy`.
